wikitext.*:
[[File:Antti Autio - The Oath of Feanor.jpg|250px|thumb|''The Oath of Feanor'' by [[Antti Autio]]]]
The '''Great Square''', also known as the '''Court of the King''',<ref>{{MR|Speech}}</ref>{{rp|§130}} was a square at the top of [[Túna]], in [[Tirion]], the great city of the [[Elves of Valinor]], where the tree [[Galathilion]] stood under the [[Mindon Eldaliéva]].<ref>{{S|5}}</ref> 

It the location where [[Fëanor]] threatened his half-brother [[Fingolfin]] in public,<ref>{{S|7}}</ref> and where later he gave his [[Speech_of_Fëanor|great speech]] and infamous [[Oath of Fëanor|Oath]].<ref>{{LR|P2VI}}, pp. 233-234</ref>
